node.description: The unstructured name for the individual.
Identifier associated with the individual.
An unstructured address line representing all relevant street-level or post-box details that would support the identification of a location.
The name of the suburb, town, city, village, community or lowest level locality that contains the address.
The name of a local government district or geographical area that contains the address.
The code for a postal delivery area containing the address, as defined by the relevant postal delivery service.
The name of the country containing the address.
Details about the location of a person, physical building or landmark.
The Birth date/time
An individual human being.
A container archetype used to hold demographic-related EHR CLUSTER archetypes.
The name of the single service or activity requested.
A short phrase describing the reason for the request.

itemsList.description: The request does not require prioritised scheduling.

node.description: Urgency of the request for service.
The date/time that marks the beginning of the valid period of time for delivery of this service.
The date/time, or acceptable interval of date/time, for provision of the service.
Additional narrative about the service request not captured in other fields.
The unstructured name for the individual.
Identifier associated with the individual.
An individual human being.
Request for a health-related service or activity to be delivered by a clinician, organisation or agency.
Identification of the procedure by name.
Transplant details
Identification of a single physical site either on, or within, the human body.
The side of the body on which the identified  body site is located.
A physical site on or within the human body.
Outcome of procedure performed.
Difficulties or issues encountered during performance of the procedure.
Details about any complication arising from the procedure.
The date and/or time on which the procedure is intended to be performed.
The date and/or time when the entire procedure, or the last component of a multicomponent procedure, was finished.
The type of procedure.
Reason that the activity or care pathway step for the identified procedure was carried out.
Additional narrative about the activity or care pathway step not captured in other fields.
A clinical activity carried out for screening, investigative, diagnostic, curative, therapeutic, evaluative or palliative purposes.
The date and/or time of the formal or statistical admission to the institution.
The unstructured name for the individual.
Identifier associated with the individual.
An individual human being.
Outcome for the individual at the end of the episode of care.
Additional narrative about the episode, not captured in other fields.

Administrative details about a period of admitted patient care between a formal or statistical admission and a formal or statistical separation, characterised by only one care type of care from a healthcare institution.
Document sent from one treating healthcare provider or organisation to another, for the purpose of requesting advice, a service or transfer of care.
